definitions.definition: (of a situation) Extremely sensitive or volatile; easily disturbed to the point of becoming unstable; requiring caution or tactfulness.
definitions.example: It is an extremely touchy situation, with everybody's patience wearing thin.

definitions.definition: (of a person) Easily offended; oversensitive; ticklish.
definitions.example: He can be very touchy when you talk about his cat, so be as tactful as possible.
